name: Masala Dosa
description: A South Indian dish consisting of a thin crepe made from rice and lentils, filled with a paste of potatoes, onions, and spices.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Chunks of chicken marinated in a yogurt and spice paste, then cooked in a creamy sauce with tomatoes and herbs.

name: Rogan Josh
description: A curry dish with lamb, cooked in a flavorful sauce of tomatoes, herbs, and spices.
